Paregraphs.Text: JIT truly believes in giving its stake holders a wide range of opportunities & good jobs to choose from. The training & placement cell of the college through extensive training programmes. makes the students of JIT, a cheery-picked group for the recruiters. 75, otthe eligible students got placements in Campus selection process atJIT, this year. Premiere companies like Infosys, Persistent Systems, Infocepts, ZENSAR Technologies, Amazon, Smart Data, Syntego, Essence IT Solutions, Mphasis, Excellon Software etc. conducted Campus interviews at JIT in a pool campus.

Lists.Header: The T & P cell grooms the students extensively in varied fields
